author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tributes paid to Jeeva

Floral tributes were paid to P. Jeevanandam, fondly known as Jeeva, one of the pioneers of communist and socialist movements in the State, on his 53rd death anniversary here on Monday. Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan garlanded the statue at Jeevanandam Mani Mandapam at Veppamedu here in the presence of former Minister N. Thalavai Sundaram, MLAs K.T. Pachaimal and A. Nanjil Murugesan and members of local bodies.

A large number of Communist Party of India (Marxist) cadres and leaders of various parties and trade unions also paid homage to the leader.
title: Floral tributes paid to Jeevanandam
